org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.db

类 DBInputFormat.DBRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,T>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.DBRecordReader<T>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.lib.db.DBInputFormat.DBRecordReader
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,T>
    封闭类:
    DBInputFormat<T extends DBWritable>

    protected class DBInputFormat.DBRecordReader
extends DBRecordReader<T>
implements RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,T>
    A RecordReader that reads records from a SQL table. Emits LongWritables containing the record number as key and DBWritables as value.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.DBRecordReader

      • next

        public boolean next(org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable key,
           T value)
             throws IOException
        Reads the next key/value pair from the input for processing.
        指定者:
        next 在接口中 RecordReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,T extends DBWritable>
        覆盖:
        next 在类中 DBRecordReader<T extends DBWritable>
        参数:
        key - the key to read data into
        value - the value to read data into
        返回:
        true iff a key/value was read, false if at EOF
        抛出:
        IOException
